title: New: Elvis Depressedly – Weird Honey
body:
_‘if there’s a cool spot in hell / I hope you’ll get it’_ Isn’t that just the ultimate declaration of modern love? Multi-talented singer songwriter **Mat Cothran** has released music under the **Coma Cinema** moniker for several years now, and whilst all the output under that moniker has been exemplary, it would be offense to simply write-off **Elvis Depressedly** as another side-project.

With this usual self-depreciating wit combining with a cunningly realistic sense of broken faith, Weird Honey is one of **Elvis Depressedly’s** finest tracks to date. Check it out.
